entry.title: Yellow Paper Daisy
entry.summary:
Author: Babysterek

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,140Chapters: 21/25Kudos: 144

Summary: “Well,” Peter says at last, forcing a crooked smile into his voice, “at least this time he didn’t almost get us all killed.”Derek swallows. His throat is dry, the words scraping on the way out. “I was drunk.” They land and disappear without effect.Talia turns then, her gaze settling on him fully. It’s steady, unreadable, and it makes his shoulders tense despite himself. “You were careless,” she says. “You are a werewolf, and if you got drunk, you laced it with wolfsbane, you did it. Do you understand, In twenty-four years, every scandal has had the same root. You. At some point, it stops being bad luck and becomes character. And I am tired of pretending this is something that merely happens to you.”---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Derek just wanted a moment of quiet. Instead, he crosses a line with the last person he should trust.....old grudges, bad decisions and a mistake he keeps repeating. "He learned the shape of the poison once,from a woman who wore it like skin.Now hemlock blooms in his own hands,and he cannot tell where she ends and he begins. "

entry.title: Do You Blame Yourself?
entry.summary:
Author: Andromeda_9000

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,281Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 2

Summary: “Stiles.”He sprung awake with a choked gasp as his hand flew to his chest, directly over his pounding heart. He blinks unseeingly around the dark room, head throbbing and mouth dry. So… so dry. His forehead was clammy with sweat as he dragged the back of his hand across it and his feet swung over the side of the bed before he was fully aware. The ground seems to rock under him, spots dotting his vision.----(OR; Stiles is hospitalized after the effects of the Nogitsune and has a panic attack/nightmare while asleep)

entry.title: Dead Ends and New Beginnings
entry.summary:
Author: Buttercupcheese

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 50,512Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 312

Summary: Stiles groaned and slowly got up. Isaac had fallen asleep somewhere between Peter’s rant about trolls' healing properties and Derek's hypothesis of witches, which — for the first time— well, not first, but Stiles wanted to exaggerate — Stiles thought the same.“Look, I'm running on just, like, three full hours of sleep. I haven't had a single drop of caffeine in my system, and my waffles are getting cold,” he said, heading to reheat his coffee.“You shouldn't drink caffeine, Stiles,” his dad said, concern and disapproval firmly set on his features.“And there shouldn’t be walking corpses out there, Dad, but hey—life’s unfair.”

entry.title: the moon is the only witness
entry.summary:
Author: idgaf_as

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,674Chapters: 2/3Kudos: 21

Summary: A couple of minutes later, he feels Stiles begin to stir and press closer. Apparently, the living heater in the form of Derek suited him just fine. The boy turns onto his side, fully hugging him like a toy now, and buries his fingers into the fur at the scruff of his neck. Derek feels him press his forehead against the top of his head. He goes still, listening as Stiles’s pulse beneath his head begins to even out, becoming steady and strong. The sticky scent of exhaustion gradually gives way to the fragrance of peaceful sleep

entry.title: Delayed Onset
entry.summary:
Author: Grumperella

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,732Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Stiles barked out a weak laugh and got a mouthful of pool water for his trouble. He spit it out. Kept swimming.“You? Mellow?”“I’m mellow.” Derek groused and the teen snorted, his eyes scrunching closed with his incredulous smile.“Not the word I’d use. Pissy. That’s the word I’d-” Derek spit water at his face and Stiles jerked his his head away and spluttered another laugh. The sudden spasm of movement made him wince, though, and gasp in pain. His eyes fluttered closed again and for a few minutes he just breathed through his teeth.He didn't know how much longer he could keep them afloat like this.----“Missing scenes" expansion on the S2x04 “Abomination” episode. SO MUCH BANTER. Mild angst & h/c

entry.title: Chaos Come Again
entry.summary:
Author: SierraStyx

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 94,769Chapters: 33/?Kudos: 1,112

Summary: Stiles has a good life. He has a great job, a great husband, and he's happy in Virginia. The pack is doing fine under Scott's leadership back in California. Aside from the grisly murder scenes he sees on cases, Stiles' life is actually pretty perfect. Which is of course, when everything goes wrong.Basically Stiles is part of the BAU team, and the Nogitsune returns. Mind games ensue. There are not nearly enough crossovers where Stiles is on the team, so idk here you go, brought to you by the voices in my head. Also in this fic Stiles and Derek didn't get together until Stiles was well into college, because I think canon-era Stiles/Derek is really creepy.

entry.title: A Fragile Thing
entry.summary:
Author: OyasumiPunPun

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,717Chapters: 2/10Kudos: 18

Summary: Derek Hale wanders into a forgotten corner of the city one rainy night, drawn by the pull of cyber-jazz from a hidden stairwell. Inside an underground gallery, one painting stops him cold—and then the artist does.Stiles Stilinski, with amber eyes, turpentine-stained hands, and an unsettling way of seeing right through people, offers something Derek has never allowed himself to want.One encounter. One fragile thing.And the carefully constructed life he’s trapped in—marriage, family, name—begins to crack.

entry.title: Distortion
entry.summary:
Author: Hellbreaker42

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 11,709Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 20

Summary: Claudia Stilinski's last words were a riddle spoken in Latin. Her husband is destroying himself trying to solve it. Her son is leaving voicemails that end the same way every time: "I love you, Dad. I miss you, but I understand."When a move to Beacon Hills promises a fresh start, neither of them expects what's waiting — least of all Stiles, who has no idea that his mother's final words weren't madness...They were a warning.

entry.title: A Flower Made Of Iron
entry.summary:
Author: XOLissy

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,333,943Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 62

Summary: Eden Parker has learned how to survive by staying soft in a world that punishes it. Adopted young, raised in the quiet fractures of Mystic Falls, and carrying truths no one else can see, Eden moves through life balancing grief, loyalty, and a dangerous kind of hope. He loves deeply. He trusts carefully. And he has no idea how many forces—human and otherwise—are already watching him. When new friendships form, old wounds reopen, and the supernatural begins to bleed into the ordinary, Eden finds himself at the center of something far larger than a high-school existence should allow. Monsters lurk in forests and shadows. Love arrives when it shouldn’t. Protection becomes complicated. And the past—buried, sealed, and forgotten—refuses to stay quiet. Some bonds are chosen. Some are fated. And some are forged in pain, blood, and devotion. Disclaimer: I do not own the Vampire Diaries, Supernatural, Teen Wolf, Smallville, or The Originals. I do not own any of the characters besides Eden Parker and Ben Monroe. All rights reserved to the writers.

entry.title: Change On The Rise
entry.summary:
Author: evvrythingisawesome

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 121,311Chapters: 68/75Kudos: 78

Summary: (Teen Wolf/Stargate Crossover AU continuation)As summer draws to a close, the Littlefield pack continues their long road to recovery. Still reeling from his sister's death and resurrection, Derek returns to his quest for the truth of his lost Hale ancestor; Cora grapples with the consequences of everything that transpired over the summer, including her return from the dead; and Stiles finds new ways to balance the desires of his inner demons with the needs of his pack.
